goals__remit: ENCS is a non-profit organization with the mission to improve the cyber security of Europe's critical infrastructures. ENCS is owned by critical infrastructure owners, our members. It is embedded in a strong network of partners in academia, government, and industry. ENCS brings together security experts to offer applied research, training, advice, and testing to our members. Its focus is currently on electricity distribution grids, and the emerging smart grid.
